questions.question_text:
On a form, which type of field has this icon which can be clicked, to see a preview of the associated record?

//IMG//

choices.D: On the Special Handling field, check the box
choices.C: On the Tag field, select Special Handling from the choice list
choices.A: Click on the Context menu, select Add Tag, type Special Handling, press enter
choices.B: Click on the More options (...) icon, click Add Tag, type Special Handling, press enter

discussion.content: B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B. Click on the More options (...) icon, click Add Tag, type Special Handling, press enter

Selected Answer: B
Just tested it in my instance - B is correct.

Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer
B is the right answer
I think option A will more fit here.
